pages.text:
[Page Title: HOME | LG's by the Creek]

top of page VIEWMENU Welcome to LG's by the Creek, the neighborhood sports bar and grill that has everything you need to enjoy a good time with good friends. Open seven days a week, we serve lunch, dinner, and Sunday brunch with mouth-watering dishes you'll keep coming back for. Whether you're hanging out with old friends or meeting new ones, our lively atmosphere and drink specials will keep you entertained all night long. Join us for live music every Saturday night and various events that we host throughout the week! Experience LG's by the Creek - Eat, Drink, and Chill LG's by the Creek is not just your run-of-the-mill bar and restaurant; it is a local friendly neighborhood watering hole where we will welcome you with open arms and are always eager to hear your stories. Whether you need a cold beer or delicious food, our team is here to provide the best possible service and atmosphere. So come on over and let us show you what LG's is all about! See the menu Welcome to the Clubhouse! Happy Hour 4-7PM
Monday - Friday What's Happening Every Wednesday Free Trivia Think you know it all?  Prove it! Free to play and win prizes every Saturday Live Music Lineup of various local bands playing live starting at 9 PM Every Sunday Brunch Join us every Sunday for brunch! LOCATION & HOURS 1005 Tanner Ford Blvd Hanahan SC, 29410 OPEN DAILY 11AM Till 2AM CONTACT lgsbythecreek.net 843-553-8046 Connect Follow us on
social media bottom of page

[Page Title: Weekly Specials | LG's by the Creek]

top of page VIEWMENU Monday Lunch Special Big 3 Special: Your choice of hamburger steak, pork loin, chicken grilled or fried along with mac and cheese, field peas, rice and gravy for $13.95! Wednesday Lunch Special Fried pork chops with rice & gravy and field peas for $12.95! Friday Lunch Special Fried shrimp, coleslaw and cries for $12.95 or spaghetti for $10.95! Tuesday Lunch Special 4 crunchy tacos (chicken or beef) and a side of chips & queso for $12.95! Thursday Lunch Special Hamburger steak smothered with gravy and mashed potatoes with green beans for $12.95! bottom of page

1. CHOOSE YOUR GREENS 
 Romaine, field mix, baby spinich 
2. CHOOSE A CHEESE
Mozzarella, cheddar, feta, American, parmesan, provolone
3. CHOOSE 5 TOPPINGS
Egg, tomato, red onion, broccoli, mushrooms, olives, cucumbers, bell peppers, almonds,
candied walnuts, sunflower seeds, corn, chickpeas, sundried tomatoes, craisins
4. CHOOSE A PROTEIN

Steak, Shrimp (+$6)
5. CHOOSE A DRESSING
Ranch, bleu cheese, caesar, balsamic, honey mustard, greek, raspberry, vinaigrette, thousand island
